Job Title: Senior Technical Product Manager

Location: Clearwater, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Job Openings > Senior Technical Product Manager

Senior Technical Product Manager – Remote – US 

We are hiring at InnQuest Software for a Senior Technical Product Manager to join our growing team in North America!

InnQuest Software develops software solutions for independent hotel accommodation providers. With solutions that manage the guest experience from search and book to check-in and check-out, InnQuest Software has been a leading provider of hotel management solutions for more than 25 years. With a global client base of more than 3000 clients in over 90 countries, we service a wide variety of accommodation providers, including hotels, resorts, condotels, campgrounds, vacation rentals and many others.

In this role, reporting directly to the Managing Director, the Senior Technical Product Manager is responsible for product planning and execution throughout the Product Lifecycle. This includes gathering and prioritizing product and customer requirements, defining the product vision, and working closely with engineering, sales, marketing, and support to ensure revenue and customer satisfaction goals are met. You must be someone who excels at people management, setting direction and priorities, managing processes and monitoring results against key business metrics.

Here is a little window into our company: InnQuest Software was acquired by Valsoft Corp and now operates under the Aspire Software portfolio. Aspire Software, the operational arm of Valsoft Corp, operates and manages Valsoft’s global portfolio of wholly owned software companies, providing mission-critical solutions across multiple verticals. By implementing industry best practices, Aspire delivers a time-sensitive integration process, and the operation of a decentralized model has allowed it to become a hub for creating rapid growth by reinvesting in its portfolio.

The successful candidate can be anywhere on the East Coast of the US, working in a remote work model or from any of our offices!

What Your Day Will Look Like

Define and articulate the product vision, strategy, and roadmap in alignment with business goals. impediments impacting successful team completion of Release/Sprint GoalsArticulate complex or technical information in a clear, concise, and structured manner to suit the intended audienceAcquire and About You

Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Software Engineering or equivalent business-related discipline required5+ years of product development experience in a supervisory capacity10+ years of developing complex software solutions Knowledge of the hospitality industryStrong knowledge/experience with cloud-based technologies and platforms, such as AWS and AzureStrong knowledge/experience with system architecture and design patternsPrior experience with Agile/Scrum development methodology requiredProven ability to lead product development teams and deliver quality productsExceptional interpersonal skills to manage, lead and motivate employeesSolid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development and web technologiesDemonstrates ability to quickly grasp new concepts and integrate them into projects as appropriate and to determine the required action rapidly and effectively in a new situationExcellent balance between technical/development understanding and business intelligenceExtensive exposure to in-house, nearshore, and offshore delivery modelsAbility to interpret and discuss technical information with a non-technical audienceAbility to multi-task and work on multiple projects simultaneouslyStrong problem-solving skills and willingness to roll up sleeves to get the job doneExcellent written and oral communication skillsHighly self-motivated and directed, with keen attention to detailExperience with Jira/Confluence and Aha! PreferredFluent in English, both written and verbal, is essential Legally authorized to work in the US

For information about Aspire Software, please visit our website at www.aspiresoftware.com

We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
